content: What's the temperature today in Shanghai?
Right now is sunny in Shanghai with a max temperature of 32 C.
Could you add Cairo to my cities, please?
What is the weather forecast for the Yucatan Peninsula for the next two weeks?
There is a 50% probability of a hurricane forming in the Caribbean in the next 7 days, otherwise it will be sunny, as usual.
Will it snow in my location in the next few days?
Snow won't come until next Winter, in about 3 months from now, according to historical data.
